email_chain.subject: Inquiry for Coal Shipment from Newcastle to Qingdao
email_chain.body:
Dear Laura,

I hope you're doing well. We are looking to ship 85,000MT of coal from Newcastle to Qingdao on CIF terms. Could you please provide a suitable vessel candidate and a freight quote?

Best regards,
Carlos Mendez

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry for Coal Shipment from Newcastle to Qingdao
email_chain.body:
Hi Carlos,

Thanks for reaching out. I can offer the vessel OCEAN TRADER, DWT 180,000, LOA 290m, currently available for your cargo. The rate is USD 25 per MT. Laycan is 1-5 October. Let me know if this works for you.

Best,
Laura

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry for Coal Shipment from Newcastle to Qingdao
email_chain.body:
Hi Laura,

Thanks for the quick response. USD 25 seems a bit high given the current market. Can you do better? Also, can you confirm the demurrage rate and loading window?

Best,
Carlos

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry for Coal Shipment from Newcastle to Qingdao
email_chain.body:
Hi Carlos,

Given the current market conditions, I can offer a revised rate of USD 23 per MT. Demurrage is USD 15,000 per day, pro rata. Loading window is 96 hours. Let me know if you need any more details.

Best,
Laura

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry for Coal Shipment from Newcastle to Qingdao
email_chain.body:
Hi Laura,

USD 23 sounds better. Can we lock in the OCEAN TRADER with a laycan of 1-5 October? Please send over the charter party for review.

Thanks,
Carlos

email_chain.subject: Fwd: Charter Party for OCEAN TRADER
email_chain.body:
Hi Carlos,

Great, I'll proceed with the booking. Attached is the charter party for your review. Let me know if you need any adjustments.

Best,
Laura

email_chain.subject: Re: Fwd: Charter Party for OCEAN TRADER
email_chain.body:
Hi Laura,

Charter party looks good. We'll proceed as discussed. Thanks for your help!

Best,
Carlos
